title: Handle Report of a Website Bug
description: A customer reports that the 'Add to Cart' button is not working on a specific product page.

tasks.description: Thank the customer for the report and gather details (product, browser, device).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information to reproduce the bug.

tasks.description: Attempt to reproduce the error based on the customer's description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the button is unresponsive on the specified page.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority ticket for the web development team, including all details and steps to reproduce.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear and actionable bug report.
